properties.name: merchantId
properties.description: The processor should supply the API merchant id.

properties.name: merchantSubId
properties.description: The processor should supply the API merchant sub id or 0 (zero) when not applicable.

properties.name: merchantPassword
properties.description: The processor should supply the API merchant password.

properties.name: processorImplName
properties.description: The processor implementation to use type either IDEBIT or INSTADEBIT
